userinterface

Class ContactController

  • java.lang.Object
    • userinterface.ContactController

  • public class ContactController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles the JavaFX view that is defined by the fxml file ContactView, and the actions triggered by the controls in the view.
    Author:
    Daniel Bj√∂rnberger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContactController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The method actionCancel is used to switch back to the ListOfContactsView without doing any modification of the database.
      void actionSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The method actionSave is used to trigger the update of an existing contact in the database, or the addition of a new contact to the database.
      void initialize()
      The method initialize is automatically called when the ContactController view is shown, in this method the save button disable property is bound to the text properties of the five text fields in order to make sure that the save button can't be clicked when one or more of the text fields have incorrect values.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContactController

        public ContactController()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        The method initialize is automatically called when the ContactController view is shown, in this method the save button disable property is bound to the text properties of the five text fields in order to make sure that the save button can't be clicked when one or more of the text fields have incorrect values. Also, if an existing contact has been selected for an update, the five text fields are filled with the corresponding contact data.

      • actionSave

        public void actionSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        The method actionSave is used to trigger the update of an existing contact in the database, or the addition of a new contact to the database. Finally, the view is switched to the ListOfContactsView.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent that triggered the save of a contact, in this case a click on the save button.

      • actionCancel

        public void actionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        The method actionCancel is used to switch back to the ListOfContactsView without doing any modification of the database.
        Parameters:
        event - The ActionEvent that triggered the save of a contact, in this case a click on the cancel button.
